sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Hysbys rwudd, a di honglad, am y blyny ddod pros buth wrth yppim ar arwudd ybo y flwuddyn yn dechre. Morgan, Einon, fl. 1693.
[17] 20-24 p. : ill.
Printed for the Author, London : 1693.
Attributed to Einon Morgan by Wing (2nd ed.) and B. Capp. English almanacs, 1500-1800, 1979. Title page contains printer's device of a circle within a square, containing three plumes within a crown and motto "Ich [d?]ien." Reproduction of original in: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru/National Library of Wales, Aberystwyth, Wales.
=======
